content: this pattern will help you make a pair of adult-sized shorts i made them for an adult male size small but they are adjustable and there are some notes for other sizes in the pattern these shorts are constructed with four panels sewn together and then the top back and waistband are crocheted on the connected pieces you will need a length of elastic in the size of your waist or you could use a crocheted cord it just won t be as comfortable if you find mistakes or have suggestions please let me know
